Generation I.Red: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 Koffing s can fuse into a Weezing over many years.
Generation I.Green: (This entry was originally untranslated in English until it was reused in Pokémon FireRed .)
Generation I.Blue: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 Koffing s can fuse into a Weezing over many years.
Generation I.Yellow: It lives and grows by absorbing dust, germs and poison gases that are contained in toxic waste and garbage.
Generation I.Stadium: A twinned Koffing that forms on rare occasions where poisonous gases pool. Its two toxic gases appear to be different.

Generation II.Gold: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
Generation II.Silver: Top-grade perfume is made using its internal poison gases by diluting them to the highest level.
Generation II.Crystal: When it inhales poisonous gases from garbage, its body expands, and its insides smell much worse.
Generation II.Stadium 2: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases. (Pokémon Red, Silver, or Crystal inserted) Top-grade perfume is made using its internal poison gases by diluting them to the highest level. (Pokémon Blue, Gold, or Yellow inserted)

Generation III.Ruby: Weezing loves the gases given off by rotted kitchen garbage. This Pok é mon will find a dirty, unkempt house and make it its home. At night, when the people in the house are asleep, it will go through the trash.
Generation III.Sapphire: Weezing alternately shrinks and inflates its twin bodies to mix together toxic gases inside. The more the gases are mixed, the more powerful the toxins become. The Pok é mon also becomes more putrid.
Generation III.Emerald: By diluting its toxic gases with a special process, the highest grade of perfume can be extracted. To Weezing , gases emanating from garbage are the ultimate feast.
Generation III.FireRed: Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small Koffing twins becoming conjoined as a Weezing .
Generation III.LeafGreen: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, two Koffing can fuse into a Weezing over many years.

Generation IV.Diamond: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
Generation IV.Pearl: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
Generation IV.Platinum: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
Generation IV.HeartGold: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Top-grade perfume is made using its internal poison gases by diluting them to the highest level.

Generation V.Black: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
Generation V.White: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
Generation V.Black 2: Inhaling toxic fumes from trash and mixing them inside its body lets it spread an even fouler stench.
Generation V.White 2: Inhaling toxic fumes from trash and mixing them inside its body lets it spread an even fouler stench.

Generation VI.X: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
Generation VI.Y: Very rarely, a sudden mutation can result in two small Koffing twins becoming conjoined as a Weezing.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Weezing loves the gases given off by rotted kitchen garbage. This Pokémon will find a dirty, unkempt house and make it its home. At night, when the people in the house are asleep, it will go through the trash.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Weezing alternately shrinks and inflates its twin bodies to mix together toxic gases inside. The more the gases are mixed, the more powerful the toxins become. The Pokémon also becomes more putrid.

Generation VII.Let's Go Pikachu: This Pokémon lives and grows by absorbing poison gas, dust, and germs that exist inside garbage.
Generation VII.Let's Go Eevee: This Pokémon lives and grows by absorbing poison gas, dust, and germs that exist inside garbage.

Generation VIII.Sword: This Pokémon consumes particles that contaminate the air. Instead of leaving droppings, it expels clean air.
Generation VIII.Shield: Long ago, during a time when droves of factories fouled the air with pollution, Weezing changed into this form for some reason.
Generation VIII.Brilliant Diamond: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.
Generation VIII.Shining Pearl: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Top-grade perfume is made using its internal poison gases by diluting them to the highest level.
Generation IX.Violet: When it inhales poisonous gases from garbage, its body expands, and its insides smell much worse.

Generation IV.HeartGold: Safari Zone (tall grass in Marshland, default Morning Day )
Generation IV.SoulSilver: Safari Zone (tall grass in Marshland, default Morning Day )
